attributes.upgradeMessage: BBC ONE for Greater London and the surrounding area. Find out more about this and the other BBC English regions at www.bbc.co.uk/england.

attributes.title: Break
attributes.desc: The latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team. Also in HD. [S] Including regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour.

attributes.title: Rip Off Britain
attributes.desc: 15/20. Gloria Hunniford, Angela Rippon and Julia Somerville investigate a builder with a string of unhappy customers, and fundraisers whose money never reached the intended charity. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Homes Under the Hammer
attributes.desc: A piece of land in Curdridge in Hampshire, a four-bedroom house in Bilston near Wolverhampton and a two-bedroom bungalow in Wigmore in Gillingham are sold at auction. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: A1: Britain's Longest Road
attributes.desc: Documentary series following the people who work on the A1. A rush-hour crash puts lives at risk. A stranded motorist gets a nasty surprise. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Close Calls: On Camera
attributes.desc: Nick Knowles presents close calls caught on film. A family on a safari holiday is attacked by an elephant. A climber plummets from Helvellyn in the Lake District. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Bargain Hunt
attributes.desc: 6/32. Edinburgh: Today's programme comes from the Highland Centre in Edinburgh. Presenter Natasha Raskin Sharp leads proceedings while experts Ben Cooper and Tim Weeks. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: BBC News at One
attributes.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: BBC News
attributes.desc: No Description

attributes.title: BBC London News
attributes.desc: The latest news, sport and weather from London. [S]

attributes.title: Doctors
attributes.desc: The Gilded Cage: Al feels uncomfortable when he is dragged into a situation with a patient. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Chase the Case
attributes.desc: 15/20. Strategy game show hosted by Dan Walker. Five players compete to win the case containing the most cash. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Escape to the Country
attributes.desc: Shropshire: Alistair Appleton is in rural Shropshire with a couple who want their andpound;500,000 budget to give them and their young children a life in the outdoors. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Garden Rescue
attributes.desc: 10/25. Weston-super-Mare: Garden renovation series. Charlie Dimmock and the Rich brothers are in Weston-super-Mare, facing an oddly shaped backyard with random levels and surfaces. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Antiques Road Trip
attributes.desc: 25/25. Phil and Louise's trip ends in Brighton, where silver and bronze dogs go under the gavel. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Pointless
attributes.desc: Quiz in which contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else can think of. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: BBC News at Six
attributes.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: BBC London News
attributes.desc: The latest news, sport and weather from London. [S]

attributes.title: The One Show
attributes.desc: If it's got Britain talking then it will get talked about on The One Show. Presented by Alex Jones and Jon Richardson. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: A Question of Sport
attributes.desc: Sue Barker hosts the fast-paced sports quiz. Captains Matt Dawson and Phil Tufnell are joined by Beth Tweddle, Matt Wallace, Lorraine Ugen and British swimming great Mark Foster. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: EastEnders
attributes.desc: Tiffany makes a shocking discovery. Shirley is determined to help Mick. Mel confronts Ray about her suspicions. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Room 101
attributes.desc: 2/9. David Mitchell, Judy Murray and Anita Rani compete to have their pet hates and peeves consigned to Room 101. Topics include sniffing, walking and eating, and sugar lumps. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Have I Got News for You
attributes.desc: 1/10. Team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop are joined by guest host Alexander Armstrong and panellists Naga Munchetty and Josh Widdicombe. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
attributes.desc: 1/6. Mammy's Spell: The family celebrate the baptism of Dermot and Maria's triplets with a party. Contains adult humour and strong language.  Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.desc: The latest national and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: The Graham Norton Show

attributes.title: Raymond Blanc: How to Cook Well
attributes.desc: 2/6. Poaching: Raymond Blanc looks at different cooking techniques, explaining how poaching conserves and enhances flavours of delicate ingredients while keeping them in shape. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Football Focus
attributes.desc: Dan Walker and guests look ahead to the weekend's football, which includes Manchester United's home game against Newcastle and Leicester's meeting with Everton. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC. Also in HD. [S] Followed by weather.

attributes.title: Rugby League: Super League...
attributes.desc: ...Playoffs Highlights. Highlights from the Super League play-off semi-finals - St Helens v Warrington Wolves and Wigan Warriors v Castleford Tigers. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.title: Bargain Hunt
attributes.desc: 6/32. Oswestry: Eric Knowles presents from the Antique and Collectors Fair at Oswestry. The reds and the blues are guided by experts Charles Hanson and Kate Bliss. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.title: Escape to the Country
attributes.desc: Property series. Nicki Chapman helps a buyer who is property shopping with her best friend. She has andpound;375,000 to find some countryside respite to suit her and her elderly mother. Also in HD. [AD,S]

attributes.desc: Jason Mohammad presents the day's football results, along with reports and reaction from the big games, including Tottenham against Cardiff and Everton's trip to Leicester. Also in HD. [S]

attributes.upgradeMessage: Dave is the home of witty banter with quizcoms, cars and comedies.

attributes.title: Parks and Recreation
attributes.desc: Fluoride: Cheery US comedy that pokes fun at local government lunacy. Leslie battles absurd rumours about Pawnee's water supply. Communists use fluoride to control our minds! S6 Ep8

attributes.title: The Indestructibles
attributes.desc: Bouncing Bombs: Dave's very own high-octane series sees Tim Warwood and Adam Gendle dream up epic stunts. Tim and Gendle try to bounce a man across a lake and into a target! S1 Ep1

attributes.title: Teleshopping
attributes.desc: Teleshopping Feature. Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your best one.

attributes.title: Teleshopping
attributes.desc: Teleshopping Feature. Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your best one.

attributes.title: MegaTruckers
attributes.desc: Keep on truckin'! Young Ryan hauls a digger to Darwin - can he fit in a family reunion with his trucker dad? Control freak Dave isn't best pleased to see boss Jon at a $2m job. S1 Ep5

attributes.title: MegaTruckers
attributes.desc: Reality TV goes on the road in this Aussie series. Fortunes could be made and lost as Jon takes on a risky operation from a rival - and there's a $97m contract up for grabs. S1 Ep6

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Kiss and Sell: Busts of rock group KISS, art deco cigarette machines, old traffic signals - another eclectic haul for the salvage supremos in the ever-watchable US reality show. S6 Ep14

attributes.title: Top Gear
attributes.desc: More motoring mischief. Jeremy Clarkson tries to outrun Japan's legendary 'bullet train' in the remarkable Nissan GT-R. Newscasters Fiona Bruce and Kate Silverton guest. S11 Ep4

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: California Gold Mine: The chipper show where two collectors turn America's trash into handy cash. Mike and Frank hit the jackpot after following up a lead on a vintage steam car. S5 Ep13

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Risks and Rewards: In Detroit, Frank takes a big risk. Meanwhile, Mike acquires a Purple Heart. S11 Ep13

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Beetle in a Haystack: A lead on a rare VW Beetle turns out to be true, but it will take some seriously heavy metal to shift it from its rustic home. S9 Ep5

attributes.title: Sin City Motors
attributes.desc: Bitchin' Rod: Corking custom car builds. Steve and pal Kyle kit out a Model A for Steve's younger brother Dusty. But will Steve want to part with this rocking rat rod when they've finished? S1 Ep8

attributes.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
attributes.desc: Documentary series following Britain's most cutting-edge police forces. Nottinghamshire Police deal with a potential inferno after the inside of a house is doused in petrol. S3 Ep1

attributes.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull...
attributes.desc: ...Challenge. Locked and Loaded: An octet of hard-as-nails blokes take up Steve Austin's punishing challenge - but only one tough guy will get the chance to win $10,000. S1 Ep5

attributes.title: Sin City Motors
attributes.desc: Wagon Rod: Master fabricator Steve Darnell is back to kit out one-of-a-kind custom cars! A Chevy Station Wagon gets a modern makeover on the inside and a rat rod exterior. S2 Ep1

attributes.title: Top Gear
attributes.desc: Formula 1 star Lewis Hamilton joins Jeremy Clarkson and his fellow petrolheads for the motoring show that packs a real punch. Vauxhall's VXR8 gets a spin on the test track. S10 Ep8

attributes.title: Top Gear
attributes.desc: Men and motors - automotive antics with Clarkson and the team. Jeremy and James May show off the ageing but massive luxury cars they bought for the price of a new Ford Mondeo. S11 Ep5

attributes.title: New: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Concrete Jungle: Mike and Frank pick New York City for the first time, beginning with a sprawling computer store. S11 Ep14

attributes.title: New: Border Force America's...
attributes.desc: ...Gatekeepers. The Border Force discover cardboard packaging that hides a deadly secret, and heroin disguised as a computer laptop baffles the most advanced narcotic detection device. S1 Ep1

attributes.title: Red Dwarf XII
attributes.desc: M-Corp: Cat, Lister, Kryten and Rimmer: unintelligent life in the universe. The Dwarfers discover that the owners of Red Dwarf have been bought out by a corporate giant. S12 Ep5

attributes.title: Red Dwarf XII
attributes.desc: Skipper: The universe-ally popular space comedy that has no parallels. Rimmer looks for another dimension where he is not such a giant loser. Well, you never know... S12 Ep6

attributes.title: QI
attributes.desc: Knowledge: Alan will be even more baffled than usual as Stephen reveals how many QI facts have been disproved since the first show! With Graham Linehan, Jimmy Carr and Jo Brand. S11 Ep7

attributes.title: Mock the Week
attributes.desc: Dr Dara puts the week's news under the microscope as Josh Widdicombe, Gary Delaney, Tiffany Stevenson and Romesh Ranganathan join the regulars to dissect the big headlines. S13 Ep5

attributes.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
attributes.desc: Deliciously deadpan host Jo Brand lords it over guests John Prescott and Gyles Brandreth and acerbic mainstays Paul Merton and Ian Hislop in the superbly scathing news quiz. S46 Ep4

attributes.title: QI
attributes.desc: Keys: The ever-witty fact-packed quiz show. Stephen Fry grills Isy Suttie, Tim Minchin, Bill Bailey and Alan Davies on all things key-related, from pianos to the QWERTY keyboard. S11 Ep8

attributes.title: Mock the Week
attributes.desc: Current affairs with a comedic slant. Dara O Briain and the regulars are joined by guests Greg Davies, Gary Delaney and Jo Caulfield to poke fun at the great and good. S11 Ep9

attributes.title: Parks and Recreation
attributes.desc: The Cones of Dunshire: Adam Scott excels in the US comedy as nerdy Ben Wyatt, who devises a tedious cone-based board game. Luckily for Leslie, he's back to work soon enough. S6 Ep9

attributes.title: Parks and Recreation
attributes.desc: Second Chunce: The 100th episode of the superlative US comedy, just as funny as the first. Leslie has a fresh shot at running for city council, just as her term is ending. S6 Ep10

attributes.title: The Indestructibles
attributes.desc: Rickshaw Wreckers: Athletes tackle insane stunts in the rollicking action sports show! Tim and Gendle take downhill mountain bike racing to the next level by adding more wheels. S1 Ep2

attributes.title: Teleshopping
attributes.desc: Teleshopping Feature. Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your best one.

attributes.title: Teleshopping

attributes.title: MegaTruckers
attributes.desc: Reality TV from down under. Haulage boss Jon tries to juggle the demands of a $100m contract with the birth of his son! And Jon's hands-on management pushes one driver too far. S1 Ep7

attributes.title: MegaTruckers
attributes.desc: To haul and back! The truckers take on the biggest job of their lives as they ship units under the watchful eye of a new client. Will boss Jon's interfering ruin everything? S1 Ep8

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Risks and Rewards: In Detroit, Frank takes a big risk. Meanwhile, Mike acquires a Purple Heart. S11 Ep13

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Concrete Jungle: Mike and Frank pick New York City for the first time, beginning with a sprawling computer store. S11 Ep14

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Escape to Motor Mountain: The pro pickers haggle with two rather different dealers: a bike collector who wants rid of it all and a hoarder who is very attached to his items. S7 Ep7

attributes.title: American Pickers
attributes.desc: Everything Must Go: Savvy salvage experts Mike Wolfe and Frank Fritz are used to dealing in big numbers, but will Frank give out his own when a bike collector turns amorous? S7 Ep8

attributes.title: Deadly 60
attributes.desc: Mozambique: Steve Backshall confronts another 60 of the world's deadliest beasts. Steve trawls the Indian Ocean for a fish so big that it can weigh as much as a double decker bus. S2 Ep7

attributes.title: Deadly 60
attributes.desc: South Africa: With his intrepid crew in tow, beast-tamer Steve Backshall is on a mission to find all the animals that most Africans spend as much time as possible avoiding. S2 Ep8

attributes.title: Deadly 60
attributes.desc: Madagascar: Extreme wildlife show. Steve Backshall encounters gremlin-like aye-ayes and Madagascar's most ferocious carnivore as he searches the island for Deadly 60 contenders. S2 Ep11

attributes.title: Deadly 60
attributes.desc: Uganda: Extreme animal encounters. Steve is in Uganda, getting up close and personal with gorillas in the mountains, squabbling baboons on the savannah and chimps in the forest. S2 Ep12

attributes.title: Red Bull Soapbox
attributes.desc: Cincinnati: With a total disregard for their welfare, amateur drivers hurtle down Cincinatti's steep streets in their nutty homemade contraptions. Makes for great TV though! S3 Ep3

attributes.title: Top Gear
attributes.desc: Formula 1 star Lewis Hamilton joins Jeremy Clarkson and his fellow petrolheads for the motoring show that packs a real punch. Vauxhall's VXR8 gets a spin on the test track. S10 Ep8

attributes.title: Top Gear
attributes.desc: Men and motors - automotive antics with Clarkson and the team. Jeremy and James May show off the ageing but massive luxury cars they bought for the price of a new Ford Mondeo. S11 Ep5

attributes.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
attributes.desc: On the beat with Staffordshire Police's bodycam squad. Cops encounter a man who fancies some late night shopping in Stoke, smashing his way through a shop front with an axe. S2 Ep7

attributes.title: Modern Wheels or Classic Steals
attributes.desc: ...Steals. Elo faces a tough challenge when Hayley requests features not typically found on classic cars - folding wing mirrors and top-of-the-range parking capabilities. S1 Ep6

attributes.title: Steve Backshall's Extreme...
attributes.desc: ...River Challenge. New. Nature series in which Steve Backshall goes on a spectacular journey on the Baliem river in Indonesia. This time he meets spiders, wasps and a local tribe. S1 Ep2

attributes.title: Would I Lie to You?
attributes.desc: Host Rob Brydon joins David Mitchell and Lee Mack - plus guests Larry Lamb, Jo Brand and Russell Howard - for the comedy panel show that tries to discern fact from fiction. S3 Ep1

attributes.title: Would I Lie to You?
attributes.desc: Rob Brydon hosts the compelling comedy panel show. Regulars David Mitchell and Lee Mack tell cock and bull stories with guests Ken Livingstone, Reginald D Hunter and Stephen Mangan. S3 Ep2

attributes.title: Would I Lie to You?
attributes.desc: Will David Mitchell, Lee Mack and guest panellists discern fact from fiction in the comedy panel show? Here, host Rob Brydon welcomes Marcus Brigstocke, Jamelia and Jimmy Carr. S3 Ep3

attributes.title: Not Going Out
attributes.desc: Magic: Pun-packed sitcom. Lucy has to entertain her goddaughter and ropes that clown Lee into performing magic at the youngster's birthday party. Dynamo needn't worry. S6 Ep7

attributes.title: Not Going Out
attributes.desc: Boat: Expect plenty of fishy puns in the superbly silly sitcom as Lee's dad Frank invites the gang to stay on his wreck of a boat, which naturally drifts out to sea. S6 Ep8

attributes.title: Mock the Week
attributes.desc: Current affairs with a comedic slant. Dara O Briain and the regulars are joined by guests Greg Davies, Gary Delaney and Jo Caulfield to poke fun at the great and good. S11 Ep9

attributes.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
attributes.desc: A real international edition as US broadcaster Max Keiser and Canadian comic Tony Law join Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to heap scorn on another week's news. Kirsty Young hosts. S46 Ep5

attributes.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is...
attributes.desc: ...Goodish. It Was an Accident and I Was Hospitalised: The man with at least 54 namesakes restarts his laptop for more witty asides. Dave irks an old pal and explains why he isn't 'a geek'. S4 Ep1

attributes.title: Room 101
attributes.desc: Catherine Tate, Rylan Clark-Neal and Nigel Havers reveal to Frank Skinner their pet peeves, including hipster restaurants, set-up paparazzi shoots - and Jeremy Corbyn. S6 Ep1

attributes.title: Room 101
attributes.desc: Frank Skinner hosts the witty show in which celebs reveal their bizarre bugbears. David Mitchell, Judy Murray and Anita Rani are riled by sugar lumps, sniffing and clutter. S6 Ep2

attributes.title: Room 101
attributes.desc: Frank Skinner lends a sympathetic ear as celebs get crabby. Ross Kemp, Sophie Ellis-Bextor and Rob Beckett are waspish about snobby shop assistants, seating plans and teeth. S6 Ep3
